content: designed by sarah zimmerman of repeat crafter me this extroar-dinary amigurumi pattern is the perfect intro to beginners looking to make their first stuffie worked in red heart super saver using basic stitches this toy pattern features a fun loopy fringe as a mane materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a aran 0313 1 ball contrast b gold 0321 1 ball contrast c cornmeal 0320 1 ball measurements approx 9 23 cm tall x 5 12 5 cm wide including legs
